Guess What! I'm Blogging Again.

but this time it ain't about Roorkee.

Posted on May 14, 2015

People who are friends with me on Facebook are perfectly aware of the fact that I go on a status marathon whenever I've vacations. But this time, I'm taking that up a notch and so, tada!!, I present to you my new blog where I'll be pouring my heart out during these two months.

But why a blog?

In the past few months, some really screwed up decisions led me to some place (known as Gurgaon) other than where most of my friends have landed. My friends would die without me and this blog will also serve to rejoice them these two months. Below is the collage of bunch of idiots (who are doing much better than me so I don't know what that makes me) I hang out with.Btw, kakul why I don't have a pic with you.

Since memories are the only constant in this ever changing worlds (I know it's not scientifically true CR/Dwivedi/Mathur so don't even say that), I hope this blog will create some memeories for all of us and will be the right way to begin a story that will never end.

So what about the old one?

Ohh I completely forgot about that!!!!

Just Kidding, actually my old blog got cluttered with a lot of nonsensical posts and so I thought of starting from scratch. Also, having your own site is way much cooler.

Anything else?

Not really but since I don't have much to do right now here's a poem for you

Roses are red,
Sky is blue,
Click Here for more,
Ya I got you
HAHAHA...

So I bid you farewell for now.
Till my next post,
Sayo Nara
